apikeys.title: API Key Management
apikeys.description: Manage system API keys and access permissions.
apikeys.columns.creator: Creator
apikeys.dialogs.create.title: Create API Key
apikeys.dialogs.create.description: Create a new API Key for system access.
apikeys.dialogs.edit.title: Edit API Key
apikeys.dialogs.status.enableDescription: Are you sure you want to enable API Key {{name}}?
apikeys.dialogs.status.disableDescriptio: Are you sure you want to disable API Key {{name}}?
apikeys.dialogs.archive.title: Archive API Key
apikeys.dialogs.archive.description: Are you sure you want to archive API Key {{name}}?
apikeys.dialogs.archive.warning: This action will hide the API Key from the list. You can still view archived keys by using the status filter.
apikeys.dialogs.view.title: View API Key
apikeys.dialogs.view.description: View the complete API key details.
apikeys.dialogs.view.warning: ⚠️ Keep your API key secure and do not share it with unauthorized parties. Anyone with access to this key can make requests on your behalf.
apikeys.dialogs.view.noExamples: Usage examples are only available for user API keys
apikeys.dialogs.bulkDisable.title: Bulk Disable API Keys
apikeys.dialogs.bulkDisable.description: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} selected API keys? This action cannot be undone.
apikeys.dialogs.bulkArchive.title: Bulk Archive API Keys
apikeys.dialogs.bulkArchive.description: Are you sure you want to archive {{count}} selected API keys? This action cannot be undone.
apikeys.dialogs.bulkEnable.title: Bulk Enable API Keys
apikeys.dialogs.bulkEnable.description: Are you sure you want to enable {{count}} selected API keys?
apikeys.dialogs.bulkEnable.warning: This action will enable all selected API keys. They will be able to make requests to the system.
apikeys.dialogs.fields.name.label: Name
apikeys.dialogs.fields.type.label: Type
apikeys.dialogs.fields.type.userDescript: User API keys inherit project scopes from the user. Suitable for personal use.
apikeys.dialogs.fields.type.serviceAccou: Service account API keys have custom scopes. Suitable for applications and services.
apikeys.dialogs.fields.scopes.label: Scopes
apikeys.dialogs.fields.scopes.descriptio: Select the permissions for this service account API key
apikeys.dialogs.fields.key.label: API Key
apikeys.errors.fetchData: Failed to fetch API key data
apikeys.errors.fetchDetails: Failed to fetch API key details
apikeys.validation.atLeastOneProfile: At least one profile is required
apikeys.validation.activeProfileMustExis: Active profile must exist in the profile list
apikeys.filters.creator: Creator
apikeys.profiles.title: API Key Profiles
apikeys.profiles.description: Configure model mapping profiles for {{name}}. When an active profile has model mappings configured, the system will automatically map requested models to their target models during API requests.
apikeys.profiles.allowedChannelsDescript: Select channels that this profile can use. If none selected, all channels are allowed.
apikeys.profiles.allowedChannelTagsDescr: Select tags to filter channels for this profile. Channels with any of the selected tags will be allowed. If none selected, tag filtering is disabled.
apikeys.profiles.allowedModelsDescriptio: Select models that this profile can use. If none selected, all models are allowed.
apikeys.profiles.quotaDescription: Limit this profile from unlimited usage. Limits apply only to API Key requests.
apikeys.validation.quotaAtLeastOneLimit: Quota must set at least one limit
apikeys.validation.quotaCostInvalid: Cost must be a valid number
